key_risks: Supply chain vulnerabilities due to reliance on global suppliers, particularly in Asia
Intense competition from traditional retailers and e-commerce giants
Brand dilution and challenges in maintaining cultural sensitivity in global markets
Premium pricing strategy limiting penetration in price-sensitive regions
controversies: Criticism for culturally insensitive products and marketing campaigns in non-Japanese markets
Potential termination of supplier relationships due to human rights violations
environmental_issues: Sustainability efforts, including eco-friendly products and packaging, are ongoing but face execution risks
social_issues: Ethical sourcing and human rights due diligence in the supply chain, though enforcement remains inconsistent
governance_issues: Challenges in maintaining brand integrity and product quality across diverse global markets
